alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 03 at 2:57PM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and near-blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches in Niobrara, Dawes, northern Sioux, and northern Goshen counties. Higher snow totals expected along and near the Pine Ridge. Lower amounts of 6 to 12 inches are expected in Box Butte, southern Sioux, and southern Goshen counties. Winds gusting as high as 50 to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Dawes, Box Butte, and Sioux County. In Wyoming, Goshen and Niobrara County. This includes Chadron, Lusk, Harrison, Alliance, and Torrington. * WHEN...From now to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
